original_text: he is like a man building a house, who dug deep and laid the foundation on the rock. And when a flood arose, the stream broke against that house and could not shake it, because it had been well built.
korean_text: 집을 짓되 깊이 파고 주추를 반석 위에 놓은 사람과 같으니 큰 물이 나서 탁류가 그 집에 부딪치되 잘 지었기 때문에 능히 요동하지 못하게 하였거니와

sentences.original_text: he is like a man building a house
and laid the foundation on the rock
the stream broke against that house
because it had been well built
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그 집이 잘 지어졌기 때문이다
